channel.title: [RESOLVED] Game update Required v0.9.4.b
channel.description:
Hey, you can call me Blyss.
I just bought the game, I love ToS and after watching a few videos I fell in love with this game aswell so I wanted to support you guys by buying the game and trying it out. The problem is, after logging in through my steam acc(I did all the confirmations...) the only options I had were seeing the credits, going to the options or closing the game. I thought it was a visual bug so I restarted the game but now when I try to log in through steam I get a message saying ''Game update Required v0.9.4.b'' while I have v0.9.4.a. That is fine but steam isnt finding any updates for the game that's why I'm a bit confused.
Hope you can help me!

item.title: [RESOLVED] Game update Required v0.9.4.b
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
I’ll go ahead and lock this.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED] Game update Required v0.9.4.b
item.dc:creator: wanksta
item.description:
I forgot to mention that I did restart steam and it wasn’t showing up but now it is, I guess that was some real unfortunate timing hehe

thanks for the fast reply.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED] Game update Required v0.9.4.b
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
Version v0.9.4b just came out.

Try verifying your files (rightclick on game -> properties -> local files -> “Verify integrity of game files”) or restart steam.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED] Game update Required v0.9.4.b
item.dc:creator: wanksta
item.description:
Hey, you can call me Blyss.

I just bought the game, I love ToS and after watching a few videos I fell in love with this game aswell so I wanted to support you guys by buying the game and trying it out. The problem is, after logging in through my steam acc(I did all the confirmations…) the only options I had were seeing the credits, going to the options or closing the game.
